name: SnapdUp.com
slogan: Connecting serious homeseekers to the best real estate agents
description:
We've created the world's first homeseekers' portal.  Not heard of that term before?  That's because we had to invent it :)
Think about how a property portal works and then think about the inverse of that?  

Consumers use us to avoid searching through fake or old property adverts, to connect to the best real estate agents and to get them to match their properties to their search criteria.  Real Estate agents use us because they can now be proactive and match people to more of their properties.

jobs.title: Senior Ruby on Rails Developer
jobs.description:
As we continue to grow we’re looking for a talented Senior full-stack Ruby on Rails developer to work in a hyper-collaborative and creative environment. You’ll be a key member of the team developing our main product. Our product is already used by thousands of customers, and with your help, we’ll move it into in a market leading position. The core values are collaboration and taking initiative; we’re not looking for someone to just write code, we’re looking for someone to be part of the conversation and help lead our flat team. To bring smarts, passion and creativity to the table to help us figure out the best way to delight our end users and clients. 

Preferably you will be able to come to our offices, but we are accepting remote and partially remote candidates. We are friendly to remote working :-).

If you are a passionate Senior Developer and think you have the skills, drive and talent to help us build up our team, we’d really like you to get in touch! 

About Us 
 
We're a growing tech startup venture backed by funds such as Seedcamp and prominent angels who were behind businesses such as Skype, Findaproperty and Prime Location.
 

Skills & Experience

•	Excellent communicator and collaborator with both technical and non-technical members of the team.

•	Ability to work in a team and individually.

•	Able to keep to agreed deadlines.

•	Excellent time management skills.

•	Able to give progress updates as and when required.

•	Calm and focused under pressure.

•	Has experience in project scoping & system conceptualisation.

•	Ability to design all layers of architecture and maintain complex systems.

•	7+ years of web development experience.

•	Expert knowledge and experience in building web API.

•	Service Oriented Architecture experience (also Microservices).

•	Expert level understanding of Ruby on Rails framework.

•	Familiarity with AWS/Google cloud environment (AWS is desirable).

•	Database knowledge and experience (Postgres is desirable)

•	Can build and lead a team of developers.
 
Benefits:
•	Competitive compensation package, equity options scheme and perks
•	A senior role in a fast-growing technology startup
•	Unlimited holidays
•	A great working environment where you can make a real impact
•	Gym Membership
•	Monthly team outings
•	Paid Team Volunteering
•	Team Breakfasts
•	Weekly social tabs
